column1: Thinking of buying this from DiMello's in Cavelossim - is it a spray or rollon, please?
I think it comes in every guise ... a cream too.

Like music says you can get cream or spray, I use to use it but not any more,as found I was getting bitten still. Some people are fine with it, however note it as only 12 percent deet, and 50 percent is recommended. I use boots own, which as 50 percent deet and works wanders. Not one bite this year:)), saw lots of people with bites this year however.

I had more bites this year than in the last 10 put together I think. I was using Boots tropical 50% deet roll on, but was still bitten, so changed completely to Mossieguard Extra, which doesn't have any deet in it at all, but citronella, menthol etc (it is recommended for use in the tropics), and hey presto, no more bites. Well, not until I got to Mumbai airport anyway. So I'll be stocking up with Mossieguard for next year, and not bothering with the deet-based stuff any more. Odomos doesn't work for me at all.

We also tried Odomos and it had no affect....I am like a mossie magnet and have to use deet based sprays...Repell 55 is good, sell on amazon....They also do Repell 100, that even keeps the O/H from biting... lol
Works fine for me but saying that I don't get bit even if I don't put any on.
works with me never get bitten also drink lots of guinness for a few weeks before you go that works to
We use repel 55 too Glyn H. Been 4 times and not one bite between us!
Found Sand-Flies a big problem this year, interesting article and a bit scaryinfoplease.com/cig/dangerous-diseases-epidemâ€¦
Oh my Lord. Wish I hadn't read it as so scary. Will try to forget about it now thank you!! Didn't expect to read about horrid complications. Fingers crossed not in Goa. Thank you.Edited: 6 years ago
Many thanks for replies. Will check out Boot's at Gatwick tomorrow before we fly. Not for me but OH puts it on at night which seems to be only time mossies are out.
Still waiting you to pay me for that Repell 55 Glynn.Oh you can give it to me tomorrow, have an early night lol.
Heard you the 1st time ... Lol

Life systems 100% deet takes the polish off ya nails but I've never been bitten!!! Lol I guess 2 weeks with this awfull stuff is better than malaria :)
Your right glyn I got repel 100 and didn't get bitten even by tho OH srayed on my wallet but no effect got eaten alive lol
LMAO...@ Brian.....You could try sewing your wallet shut... Lol
What with glyn polonium210 lol great win for the blades mate
Will use repel 55 and sss original body oil from avon
